abstract: We improved the neutron lifetime formula and the gravitational constant formula to generate stronger constraints between them. And improved their calculation accuracy, so that they are in better agreement with the experimental data. By calculating the improved formulas, the neutron lifetime is 877.7495 ��, and the gravitational constant is 6.6742986×10−11 ��3/(����·��2).
